Reviews.Title: Q-SEE 8 CAMERA DVR with 500GB DRIVE and 8 600TVL Q-SEE bullet cameras
Reviews.Author: Mahadeo
Reviews.Content: No problems so far.  Quality is good for an analog system.  If you want better quality go for IP megapixel cameras or an SDI system.

Reviews.Title: qsee qt548
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The 80s called and want their dvr back. With new technology available this system seems very cheap and old school. The software seems very outdated.

ProductInfo.Name: Q-SEE 8 CAMERA DVR with 500GB DRIVE & HDMI OUT QT548-5
